import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Signup() { const [ data, setData ] = useState({ name: '', username: '', email: '', password1: '', password2: '' }) const { name, username, email, password1, password2 } = data const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(password1 !== password2) { console.log('Passwords do not match') } else { const config = { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } } const body = { name, username, email, password1 } axios.post('http://localhost:5000/register') } } return (

setData({ ...data, username: e.target.value })} required autocomplete="off" />
setData({ ...data, email: e.target.value })} required autocomplete="off" />
setData({ ...data, password1: e.target.value })} required autocomplete="off" />
setData({ ...data, password2: e.target.value })} required autocomplete="off" />
) } export default Signup;
